thread.title: Biotech Gets a Reality Check

author: Charley Grant
title: Biotech Gets a Reality Check
text:
A major source of biotech sector optimism just took a significant hit.
The drug industry has poured billions of dollars into novel drugs that fight cancer, generating exciting results for patients and significant value for biotech investors. It is a problem, then, when potential blockbuster drugs miss the mark.
Cancer specialist Incyte announced...
